Uses of Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config.ConfigurationLoader

  • Packages that use ConfigurationLoader 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config
    Contains a compact framework for handling the process configuration.

    • Uses of ConfigurationLoader in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config

      Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config that implement ConfigurationLoader 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AssetsConfigurationLoader
      A basis class which reads the configuration from a the assets directory.
      class  InternalStorageConfigurationLoader
      A basis class which reads the configuration from a file located in the Android application internal storage.
      class  ResourcesConfigurationLoader
      A basis class which reads the configuration from a the res sub-directories.
      Methods in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config that return ConfigurationLoader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConfigurationLoader ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.getInstance(ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationLocation configurationLocation, ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory.ConfigurationFormat configurationFormat, java.lang.String value)
